update t_video
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cover_real_name = #{coverRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description_real_name = #{descriptionRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_real_name = #{videoRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
classification = #{classification,jdbcType=BIGINT},
profit_share = #{profitShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover_name = #{coverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description_name = #{descriptionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
free_watch_time = #{freeWatchTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_video set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cover_real_name = #{coverRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_real_name = #{descriptionRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_real_name = #{videoRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classification = #{classification,jdbcType=BIGINT}, profit_share = #{profitShare,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_name = #{coverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_name = #{descriptionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, free_watch_time = #{freeWatchTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select v.id, v.title, v.subtitle, v.price, v.cover_real_name, v.description_real_name, v.video_real_name, v.create_time, v.update_time, v.del_flag, v.classification, v.profit_share, v.status, v.cover_name, v.description_name, v.video_name, v.free_watch_time, vc.v_name as classification_name, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.statistics_type = '003003' and s.business_id = v.id) as watched, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.statistics_type = '003004' and s.business_id = v.id) as purchased, (select count(1) from t_statistics s where s.statistics_type = '003005' and s.business_id = v.id) as accessed from t_video v left join t_video_classification vc on v.classification = vc.id where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
